title: Contact Center Associate Dashboard

Contact Center Agent Dashboard

  • Case Metrics
  • Open Cases Metrics
  • Comparison of Top 10 Categories of Open Cases
  • Related Articles

This is the main landing page of the contact center agent that helps them get an overview of all the customer issues that need to be looked into and worked upon. It mainly consists of: 

  •  Case Metrics: This is used to highlight the overall case metrics that help the contact center agent plan, assess, and track all the cases available to them. 
  •   Open Cases display: This is used to have a quick look at the most critical/ high priority cases that need immediate attention based on priority. 
  •   Case Category Comparison: This is used to compare cases based on the category they belong to and can also be used to understand the major problem areas that most issues are coming from. 

Case Metrics

  • My Escalated cases - This metric shows the open cases that a contact center agent currently has in their name that are of high or critical priority.

  • My Open Cases - This metric shows all the open cases that a contact center agent currently has in their name.

  • Cases Assigned to my Team - This metric shows all the cases assigned to the team(s) that the logged-in user belongs to. It does not include closed cases.

  • My resolved cases today - This metric shows all the cases that were closed by the contact center agent on the day. 

  • Past Due cases - This metric shows all the cases that belong to the logged-in user that have past the due date. It does not include closed cases.

Note: Clicking on any of the metrics will navigate to the Case list UI with relevant filters applied to show metric results. 

Open Cases Metrics

This metric shows the top 4 open cases that a contact center agent currently has in his/her name. Displayed in the highest to the lowest priority order.

Comparison of Top 10 Categories of Open Cases

This is a graphical representation of the number of tickets under each of the top 10 case categories.
